meanings.definition: A financial gain, especially the difference between the amount earned and the amount spent in buying, operating, or producing something.
meanings.sent1: The company made a good profit this year.
meanings.sent2: She invested in the stock market to make a profit.
meanings.sent3: The piggy bank was so full of profit, it almost burst!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a profit of happiness that brightened the room.
meanings.sent5: The profit from selling lemonade was enough to buy a new bike.

meanings.definition: To obtain a financial advantage or benefit.
meanings.sent1: He hoped to profit from the real estate deal.
meanings.sent2: They decided to profit from the sale of their old car.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to profit from the fish market, but got caught!
meanings.sent4: She aimed to profit from her hard work like a bee gathering nectar.
meanings.sent5: The farmer knew how to profit from the fertile soil to grow abundant crops.
